titleStmt.title: By the King. His Majestie taking into his princely consideration the manifold inconveniences and mischiefs that may arise and happen by the riotous and tumultuous assemblies, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
"Given at our court at VVhitehall, this eight and twentieth day of December, in the seventeenth yeer of our reign.".
With engraving of royal seal of Charles I at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and
